name: acquireRelease
signature: <A, E, R, R2, X>(acquire: Effect<A, E, R>, release: (resource: A, exit: Exit<unknown, unknown>) => Effect<X, never, R2>) => Stream<A, E, R | R2>
description:
Creates a stream from a single value that will get cleaned up after the
stream is consumed.
documentation:
Creates a stream from a single value that will get cleaned up after the
stream is consumed.
